attributes.action: lets get these gates locked and keep our loved ones safe
attributes.additional_details: Losing a loved ones is hard enough and the grief never goes away ,so when we discover that there resting place has been violated by thieves and senseless destruction it makes the pain more intense and does not help the healing process ,you wouldn't like to think of your loved ones been desacrated in this way so why are we expected to accept it. Please take a moment to sign this to help protect our loved ones now and in the future !!!!
